DataSource.Query: SELECT customers.account_id, core.get_office_name_by_office_id(@OfficeId) office, accounts.account_id, accounts.account_number, accounts.account_name, pt.amount as previous_period, t.amount as current_period, COALESCE(pt.amount, 0) + COALESCE(t.amount, 0) as total FROM inventory.customers JOIN finance.accounts ON customers.account_id = accounts.account_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT verified_transaction_view.account_id acc_id, SUM ( CASE WHEN finance.verified_transaction_view.tran_type = 'Dr' THEN finance.verified_transaction_view.amount_in_local_currency ELSE finance.verified_transaction_view.amount_in_local_currency * -1 END ) AS amount FROM finance.verified_transaction_view WHERE finance.verified_transaction_view.value_date < @From AND finance.verified_transaction_view.office_id IN (SELECT * FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId)) AND finance.verified_transaction_view.account_id IN ( SELECT account_id FROM inventory.customers ) GROUP BY verified_transaction_view.account_id ) pt ON customers.account_id = pt.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT verified_transaction_view.account_id acc_id, SUM ( CASE WHEN finance.verified_transaction_view.tran_type = 'Dr' THEN finance.verified_transaction_view.amount_in_local_currency ELSE finance.verified_transaction_view.amount_in_local_currency * -1 END ) AS amount FROM finance.verified_transaction_view WHERE finance.verified_transaction_view.value_date >= @From AND finance.verified_transaction_view.office_id IN (SELECT * FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId)) AND finance.verified_transaction_view.account_id IN ( SELECT account_id FROM inventory.customers ) GROUP BY verified_transaction_view.account_id ) t ON customers.account_id = t.acc_id WHERE COALESCE(t.amount, 0) != 0 OR COALESCE(pt.amount, 0) != 0
